title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other two from:   Geography, Government, Account, Book keeping, Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other from: Geography, or Government,   Account, Book keeping, Commerce or  Financial Accounting,  Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics,  and two other subjects from Fine Art, Geography Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Introduction to Building Construction, further maths and Land surveying.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Fine Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING AND FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other two from:   Geography, Government, Account, Book keeping, Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one from:  Geography, or Government,   Account, Book keeping, Commerce or  Financial Accounting,  Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language,  Mathematics and other three from : Biology, Chemistry,  Food and Nutrition, Agricultural Science, Health/General Science or Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language,  Mathematics and other three from : Agricultural Science, Biology, Chemistry,  Food and Nutrition, Health/ General Science or Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUILDING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics, and two other subjects from : Chemistry, Geography, Fine Arts and Technical drawing, Building Construction, Land survey, Biology, Computer science, computer studies, data processing, integrated science, Further maths
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any from Chemistry, Geography, Biology, Computer science, data processing, Further mathematics Integrated science or physics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other two from:   Geography, Government, Account, Book keeping, Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing. Or Biology, chemistry, Computer science, Computer studies, Data Processing, Physics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one from:  Geography, or Government,   Account, Book keeping, Commerce or  Financial Accounting,  Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Store Management and Type writing. Or Biology, chemistry, Computer science, Computer studies, Data Processing, Physics.

title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and Biology, Further Mathematics or Technical Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any of Biology, Building Construction, woodwork, Further Mathematics or Technical Drawing.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Pure Mathematics or Pure and Applied Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any of Applied Electricity, Basic Electronics, Biology, Computer Studies, Information Technology, Further Mathematics or Technical Drawing..
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics Chemistry and any from Biology, computer science or computer studies.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CRIMINOLOGY AND SECURITY STUDIES
de_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes or equivalent including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) Arts or Social Sciences, History, Civics or Geography at not more than two (2) sittings.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes or equivalent including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) Arts or Social Sciences, History, Civics or Geography at not more than two (2) sittings.
subjects: Economics, Government, and any one of the following: History, Geography, Literature in English, French, IS, Hausa.

title: DEMOGRAPHY & SOCIAL STATISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A'  level passes in Geography, Economics, Government and Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government and any one of Geography or Biology
subjects: Mathematics, Economics/Geography and any other subject.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other two from:   Geography, Government, Account, Book keeping, Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Or Biology, Agricultural science, Computer science, Computer studies, Data Processing.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, and any one from:   Geography, Government, Account, Book keeping, Business Management, Commerce, Marketing, Business studies, Office practice, Insurance, Financial Accounting, Or Biology, Agricultural science, Computer science, Computer studies, Data Processing.

title: ELECTRICAL /ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any of Applied Electricity, Basic Electronics, Biology, Computer Studies, Information Technology, Further Mathematics or Technical Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O/L credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any other two subjects from Arabic, CRS, Civic Education, Geography, Government, History,  Islamic studies, fine Art, History, Igbo, Music, Yoruba.
subjects: Literature in English,  and any other two from Arabic, CRS, Civic Education, Geography, Government, History,  Islamic studies, fine Art, History, Igbo, Music, Yoruba.

title: ENTREPRENEURSHIP
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Economics and at least one of, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one Science subject and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Biology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including Mathematics, English Language, Economics and  Biology or Health Science , Civic Education, Geography or Government,   Fine Art,  Agric Science,  Health Science, data processing Physical Education, Further math, Accounting, Book keeping,  Commerce,  Business studies, Financial Accounting,  Technical Drawing,  Building Construction, and Land surveying.
subjects: English and any three from: Civic Education or Fine Art, Accounting, Book keeping, Commerce or  Financial Accounting, Geography, Biology, Economics, Business studies, Technical Drawing, Data processing, chemistry, computer science, computer studies, food and nutrition, Building Construction, Agric science, further maths and Land surveying, Health science, Physics or Mathematics.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.

title: INDUSTRIAL MATHEMATICS
